page.title: 14RECREATION IN RIPON
page.content: Ripon has a good variety of things to do.The Spa Gardens are a main attraction to old people.They can sit on the benches or have a game of bowls.Next to the Spa Gardens is the Spa Baths.Lots of children go to the baths,there is also a sauna and sunbeds.There is a Y.M.C.A.and a youth centre for teenagers and both have disco's and go out for day trips.There is a golf club which has members that age from 14-over 60's.There are many competitions.There are other clubs in Ripon,to which people belong. There are the football,cricket and rugby clubs.Each has its own ground in which games are held every week when the season starts.Keep fit fanatics go to one of the two gyms in Ripon,which are called Intrim and XL. Lightwater Valley near Ripon is a visitor farm and adventure park.
